title: Scenario: Default selection in drop down box for teams
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to view the drop down box

title: Scenario: Select By Affiliate
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL is http://wap.milb.com/teams/
or
custom_steps:
When
'By Affiliate' is selected from the drop down
custom_expected:
Then
The URL becomes http://wap.milb.com/teams/?sort_by=affiliate
and
the listings are alphabetical by the MLB Affiliates by mlb_org
and
under each affiliate is the listing of minor league teams in alphabetical order by name_display_full

title: Scenario: Select By Class
custom_steps:
When
By Class is selected from the drop down box
custom_expected:
Then
The the url becomes http://wap.milb.com/teams/?sort_by=class
and
the classes are listing in alphabetical order by sport_code_display
and
the teams in each section are listed in alphabetical order by name_display_full

title: Scenario: Select By League
custom_steps:
When
By League is selected from the drop down box
custom_expected:
Then
The url becomes http://wap.milb.com/teams/?sort_by=league
and
the listing is by alphabetical order by league by name_full on league lookup
and
the teams under each league are also listed in alphabetical order by name_display_full

title: Scenario: clicking on a team
custom_steps:
When
A team link is clicked on by name_display_full
